Mafia III-CODEX
Mafia III (c) 2K - MAFIA 3

Release Date :  10/2016              Protection : SteamArxan
Discs        :  1                    Genre      : Action

Its 1968 and after years of combat in Vietnam, Lincoln  Clay  knows
this truth: family isnt who youre born with, its who you  die  for
Now  back  home  in New  Bordeaux, Lincoln  is set  on  escaping  a
criminal past. But when his surrogate  family, the  black  mob,  is
betrayed and wiped out by the Italian Mafia, Lincoln builds  a  new
family on the ashes of the old and blazes a path  of military-grade
revenge through those responsible
